# This file is autogenerated
title: getAlchemyRpcUrl
description: Overview of the getAlchemyRpcUrl method
slug: wallets/reference/alchemy/common/functions/getAlchemyRpcUrl
---

Gets the Alchemy RPC base URL for a given chain ID.

## Import

```ts
import { getAlchemyRpcUrl } from "@alchemy/common";
```

## Usage

```ts
const rpcUrl = getAlchemyRpcUrl(1); // "https://eth-mainnet.g.alchemy.com/v2"
const customUrl = getAlchemyRpcUrl(999); // undefined
```

## Parameters

### chainId

`number`
The chain ID to lookup

## Returns

`string | undefined`
The Alchemy RPC base URL or undefined if not supported
